body.name: MILK PLANT BASE KIDS
features: OUR WORLD-FAMOUS PLANT-BASED MILK: The product that made us who we are, now available in a new formulation just for kids. Ripple Kids Milk is an FDA milk substitute and better tasting too!

THE BETTER NON-DAIRY MILK: Pea protein has a higher nutritional value, is more eco-friendly, sustainable, and tastes better than almond, soy, oat, and other plant-based milk. Ripple Kids has a smooth, creamy texture, and contains 50% more calcium than cow’s milk, as well as prebiotics to support happy tummies and easy digestion.

DELICIOUS & NUTRITIOUS: Developed with pediatricians, this product delivers key nutrients including iron, protein, DHA, vitamin D & other essential vitamins to support brain development and healthy, growing bodies.
ONLY THE GOOD STUFF: 100% dairy-free, nut-free, soy-free, gluten-free, lactose-free & non-GMO, so you can enjoy with your kids worry-free.

BUSINESS FOR GOOD: As both a Public Benefit Corporation (PBC) and a Certified B Corp, we’re committed to the highest standards of sustainability, transparency, and performance across all areas of our business.
body.description: Can smart choices really be delicious? We say ‘YES’! When you choose dairy free, you shouldn’t have to compromise on nutrition or taste. Now we’ve made something especially for your little ones. Ripple Kids was developed with Pediatricians1 to deliver key nutrients specific for growing kids. In addition to the 8g of plant-based protein from peas, Ripple Kids has 50mg DHA, choline, and prebiotic fiber for growing bodies, along with many of the essential nutrients found in dairy milk - calcium, magnesium, riboflavin, and vitamins A, D, and B12. And most important, it delivers the same creamy and delicious taste kids love! Dairy Free. As it Should Be. We are Ripple. We make plant-based foods that are high in protein, low in sugar, and most importantly, loaded with nutrition and deliciousness. Why Peas? Simply put, pea protein is the best plant-based solution there is. Peas require less water, are more sustainable and have a smaller environmental footprint than dairy or other milk alternatives, reducing impact on the earth and soil. It’s better for the world. Ripple has 8X the protein of almonds and 50% more calcium than dairy. Ripple is low calorie, high in potassium and omega-3s, meaning it’s better for you. Lastly, our proprietary pea protein is patented and designed by scientists to be as delicious as scientifically possible. Say goodbye to the thin, chalky texture of soy, almond, oat, and cashew milk. It tastes better!

productInformation.name: Allergen Information
productInformation.value: Dairy Free, Lactose Free, Nut Free, Gluten Free, Soy Free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Taste great, easy on stomach. All three on my kiddos love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has food gums which are a stomach irritant for many people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delicious vegan option
reviews.reviewText: I need a lactose free option. I found Ripple for my family. Ripple is great for kids. It has a good amount of fiber to keep kids regular if they're picky about vegetables. It has a lot of protein and calcium. The flavor is also great. It's something my toddler reaches for whenever he has a meal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tasty and healthy. Perfect for a Vegan diet. I use with coffee
reviews.reviewText: I've been drinking plant based milk for decades. Their pea milk was great and this came out.This one oils critical for children and great for all of us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than cows milk!!
reviews.reviewText: I weened my daughter from nursing with this stuff and feel so good providing this for her. It has less sugar and more vitamins than Full fat Cows milk. It’s a bit more expensive, but worth every penny in my book! My daughter loves this stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it
reviews.reviewText: I have been giving my kids this milk for a few months now and have noticed a significant improvement in their energy levels and overall health. The milk is easy for them to drink and they love the taste. It is also a convenient way to ensure that they are getting enough protein in their diet, as they can be picky eaters at times. I feel good knowing that I am giving them a nourishing and delicious drink that is helping them grow and stay healthy. I will definitely continue to purchase this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect substitute with dairy allergies
reviews.reviewText: Our little one has a severe protein allergy and this was a the perfect substitute for milk! Definitely has an earthy taste but she doesn’t seem to mind!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great substitution for whole milk in babies with a dairy allergy/intolerance
reviews.reviewText: This is a great substitution for whole milk in babies 12 months to 2 years. It has the most similar profile to whole milk and offers all the benefits necessary in that age range. It is costly, but it’s really the only non-dairy substitute that offers the amount of vitamin D and calcium necessary for development. Our little one loves it!
